name: beep8
description: Beep8 is a retro game Javascript engine that lets you quickly create games inspired by the look and feel of a retro 80s computer. It's not an emulator or a fantasy console: it's just a Javascript library. It's free and open-source.

scripts.build:core: concat-cli -o dist/beep8.core.js -f src/beep8.js src/config.js src/public.js src/public-async.js src/internal/*.js
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:transpile && npm run build:lib && npm run build:minify && npm run build:clean
scripts.dev:build: concat-cli -o dist/beep8.js -f src/beep8.js src/config.js src/public.js src/public-async.js src/internal/*.js src/libraries/*.js
